title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
00:38 <npm\_> has joined #xwiki  
00:39 <npm> has quit  
00:42 <CIA-102> Fabio Mancinelli master \* r0cf567c / (2 files in 2 dirs): Code reformatting (+7 more commits...) - http://git.io/t\_7VVA

06:19 <npm\_> is now known as <npm>

07:54 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki

15:03 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
15:05 <DrLou> has quit  
15:05 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
16:43 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
16:55 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* rb9d2cf5 / (6 files in 4 dirs):  
16:55 <CIA-102> XRENDERING-154: Create a Transformation to check broken external links  
16:55 <CIA-102> \* Added ability to change the default timeout after which a link should be rechecked  
16:55 <CIA-102> \* Changed default recheck timeout to be 1 hour instead of 5 minutes to make generate less network queries  
16:55 <CIA-102> \* Fix bug where the state of a link already checked wasn't updated - http://git.io/Tv1D\_w  
16:55 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* r1216a5f / (2 files in 2 dirs):  
16:55 <CIA-102> XRENDERING-154: Create a Transformation to check broken external links  
16:55 <CIA-102> \* Make sure the thread is stopped - http://git.io/pl-nEA  
17:07 <jlagarde> has joined #xwiki  
17:12 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* r07b5cd8 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-ircbot/src/main/resources/IRC/BrokenLinksBotlet.xml : XWIKI-7130: Add ability to get IRC notifications when detecting broken external links in the wiki - http://git.io/TXQT\_w  
17:38 <jlagarde> Hi all  
17:39 <jlagarde> I want to test the installation of an extension with a local maven repository  
17:39 <jlagarde> I followed the instructions of http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Extension+Module#HConfiguringExtensionRepositories  
17:40 <jlagarde> But I'm not sure of my url: extension.repositories=local:maven:file:///C:/Users/jer/.m2/repository/  
17:41 <vmassol> hi jlagarde  
17:41 <jlagarde> This isn't working (I probably missed a step.)  
17:42 <jlagarde> hi Vincent  
17:42 <vmassol> you can try opening ile:///C:/Users/jer/.m2/repository/ in your browser to verify it's correct  
17:43 <vmassol> it should list the files in your local repo  
17:44 <vmassol> if you've restarted XE it should work fine  
17:44 <vmassol> tell me what's not working and what artifact id you've used  
17:44 <vmassol> s/artifact/extension/  
17:44 <vmassol> I think the issue is not the configuration  
17:45 <jlagarde> It's  okay in my browser ( file:///C:/Users/jer/.m2/repository/org/xwiki/contrib/xwiki-extension-mantis/1.0-SNAPSHOT/xwiki-extension-mantis-1.0-SNAPSHOT.pom open the pom.xml)  
17:46 <vmassol> so I think you're not using the EM correctly  
17:46 <vmassol> tell me what you're doing and I can help  
17:46 <jlagarde> I add EXTENSION IDENTIFIER : org.xwiki.contrib:xwiki-extension-mantis  
17:47 <jlagarde> and EXTENSION VERSION : 0.1-SNAPSHOT  
17:48 <vmassol> 0.1 or 1.0?  
17:48 <vmassol> :)  
17:49 <jlagarde> It's better with 1.0 thx ..... ;)  
17:50 <vmassol> since you're one of the first users of the EM, let us know how it goes  
17:52 <jlagarde> I want to test the transitive dependencies for my extension  
17:54 <vmassol> yep  
17:55 <vmassol> guys, I'm updating the IRC bot app on xwiki.org  
18:26 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
18:27 <vmassol> !news  
18:27 <vmassol> XWIKI-1000  
18:27 <vmassol> !jira pdf  
18:28 <vmassol> ok bot is back and operational again :)  
19:07 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* re6d5e33 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-ircbot/src/main/resources/IRC/BrokenLinksBotlet.xml :  
19:07 <CIA-102> XWIKI-7130: Add ability to get IRC notifications when detecting broken external links in the wiki  
19:07 <CIA-102> \* Fix small bug - http://git.io/-kZn2w  
19:09 <vmassol> ahah fun….  
19:09 <vmassol> seems like bots are having fun with each other ;)  
19:10 <@cjdelisle> hah  
19:10 <@cjdelisle> unexpected consequences  
19:10 <vmassol> cjdelisle:  is it possible to configure CIA to only generate a single line notification?  
19:10 <@cjdelisle> I know it is possible to tinker with it.  
19:10 <vmassol> (or at least reduce the # of lines)  
19:27 <jlagarde> has quit  
19:45 <@cjdelisle> limited it to 2 lines, hopefully that shortens it without making it useless  
19:55 <vmassol> ok let's see when the next commit comes up, thanks  
20:14 <Ruudjah2> has joined #xwiki  
20:56 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
21:04 <vmassol> has quit  
21:25 <Ruudjah2> has quit  
21:48 <jlagarde> has quit
